string.text: "Bison Group": Find the missing group
"Bison Group": Inspect the body
The Bison Group set out to search for some kind of artifact, why they needed it is unknown, the only thing I know for sure is the starting point of the group, so that's where I'll start.
Bison is dead, need to inspect its body, may find something.
"Assault": Wait for Krasnopol's group
"Assault": Talk to Krasnopol
"Assault": Destroy the enemy
"Assault": Talk to Krasnopol
Need to wait for Krasnopol's group before attacking the Mercenary's base.
The group has arrived, it's worth talking to Krasnopol before starting the assault.
The group has begun the assault, need to destroy the mercenaries.
The mercenaries are dead, need to talk to Krasnopol.
"Theft": Retrieve my belongings
Bandits took all my belongings, need to retrieve them.
"Help": Respond to the distress signal
The neutral leader asked to check the distress signal, it is located near the camp.
"Inhabitants": Reach the stalker camp
"Inhabitants": Talk to the locals
The search should start at the local stalker camp, I'm sure the group was there, they couldn't have gone out empty-handed, it's worth asking the locals about the group.
A stalker at the camp entrance suggested talking to the camp leader and the trader. Since there are no other ideas, it's worth doing this.
"Swamp Creature": Kill the monster
"Swamp Creature": Return to Foma
The trader asked to get rid of some swamp creature for information about a group.
The creature is dead, now it's possible to return to the trader for information.
"Retribution": Find the killer
"Retribution": Decide Kostya's fate
Apparently, a mercenary killed this stalker and took the artifact. It's necessary to find this mercenary and try to figure out the reason.
The mercenary who killed the stalker is now worm food, but there is still one culprit - Kostya. It's worth talking to Rzhavy about this.
"On the hot trail": explore the tunnel
The trader didn't shed much light on the situation with the group, but gave a clue about a local tunnel where Bison went after buying supplies. It's worth checking everything there.
"Catacombs": Find out more
"Catacombs": Wait for a message
"Catacombs": Talk to Foma
"Catacombs": Find the hideout
"Catacombs": Find the Key
"Catacombs": Open the doors
"Catacombs": Descend into the dungeon

In the tunnel, some traces of a group were found. They had been there for over three days. However, in addition to that, Rezak's PDA was found. He is one of the members of the Bison group. The PDA contained information about certain catacombs. We need to find out more about them and where they lead.

Unfortunately, Foma doesn't know anything about the catacombs. But he says he knows an old man who can help. He doesn't know where to find him, but this old man is a frequent visitor to the bar, and Foma promised to leave a message when the old man shows up.
The trader sent a message that he has news and it is important to talk to him as soon as possible.
The old man who knew how to get into the catacombs is dead. The trader has coordinates for a cache where there may be something that can help me in the search for the entrance to the catacombs.

There weren't many things in the old man's cache, but the most interesting was in an old manuscript. It said that one of the entrances to the catacombs was sealed, but there is another. To get to it, you need to find a key to the complex. Based on the notes, it is located somewhere on the same premises as the entrance to the complex.
I have the key, and I didn't expect it to be a magnetic key card, but a key is a key, as long as it opens those doors.
The doors are open, and now I can descend into the catacombs following the group.
"Uninvited Guests": Recon
"Uninvited Guests": Cross the Fence
"Uninvited Guests": Eavesdrop on the Conversation
"Uninvited Guests": Return to Rzhavy
Rzhavy has given me a job: I need to find out why mercenaries have come to the area. It's worth scouting the military base.
The door to the base is locked, so there is no key. I'll have to find another way in, and I think I can climb over the fence.
Eavesdrop on the conversation of the mercenaries.

From the conversation between the mercenaries, it became known that they were hired to search for some artifact and that the sought-after item was already with them. It was also learned from the mercenaries that their leader is someone called "Krivoy."
"Stranger among our own": Wait until nightfall.
"Stranger among our own": Check the mercenaries' camp.
"Stranger among our own": Escape from the dungeon.

Information was found on the Mercenary's PDA indicating that the leader of the neutrals, Kosta, is somehow involved with the mercenaries. We should wait until nightfall to check the mercenaries' camp.
Now is the right time; I think the mercenaries have already left.
We need to find a way to escape from the dungeon...
"Like on a resort": Find your things.
"Like on a resort": Talk to Krasnopolsky.
"Like on a resort": Retrieve your things.
The mercenaries took all my gear; I think it's somewhere nearby.
The room is locked, and it seems the lieutenant already has the key. I should talk to him.
I have the key to the room of the Merc leader, so now I can open the door and retrieve my gear.
"Messenger of Justice": Talk to Rusty
"Messenger of Justice": Await a message
"Messenger of Justice": Return to Rusty
"Messenger of Justice": Interrogate Kosta
"Messenger of Justice": Kill Kosta

My suspicions about the neutral faction leader - Kosta - have been confirmed. He collaborated with mercenaries, sold them artifacts, and according to the latest information, he sent a stalker to be killed by the "blue" ones.
I informed Rusty about the bought leader. He asked me to wait a couple of hours to tell the camp residents everything, and then he will contact me to decide what to do next.
Rusty sent a message. We need to talk.
Before killing Kosta, it's worth interrogating him.
I've learned everything I needed to know, so now it's time to kill him.
"Prisoner of Circumstances": Wait for nightfall
"Prisoner of Circumstances": Go on a raid
"Prisoner of Circumstances": Clear out the camp
"Prisoner of Circumstances": Talk to the prisoner
"Prisoner of Circumstances": Talk to Rusty
Kosta, before his death, revealed that Zhekan is still alive and being held captive by the bandits. Rusty wants to free him and has suggested that we join him. We need to wait for nightfall.
The best time for a surprise attack is at night. Let's talk to Rusty.
We won't be able to free the prisoner quietly, so we have to clear out the whole bandit camp.
The bandits are dead, and we should talk to the prisoner before returning to the camp.
The prisoner has been released, the bandits are dead, now I can talk to Rzhavy about my reward, and it's time to return to camp.
"Children of the Dungeons": Explore the Catacombs
"Children of the Dungeons": Escape from the Catacombs
Based on all the information I've managed to dig up from those stalkers, the group headed through these catacombs, but where do they lead? What's going on in them right now? It's best to be careful.

Skeletons, fresh stalker corpses, everything suggests that the group never made it out of the catacombs, but among all the bodies, I couldn't find anyone from Bison's group, and he wasn't there either. Does that mean they did make it out after all? It's worth moving on and looking for an exit.
"Voron": Unlock the PDA
"Voron": Wait for the Unlocking
"Voron": Retrieve the PDA
In the catacombs, I found Voron's corpse. He was part of Bison's group, and I managed to find a PDA on him, but it's locked. I need to find a technician who can help me unlock it.
The PDA was given to a local technician - the Pianist. He promised to unlock it, I just need to wait.
The technician informed me that the PDA is now unlocked. I should retrieve it.
"In the Footsteps": Find Information
"In the Footsteps": Talk to Garik
"In the Footsteps": Check the Lead
"In the Footsteps": Check the Shack
"In the Footsteps": Talk to Toha
The catacombs are already behind us. We managed to find Raven there, but the rest of the group apparently got out, which is actually good news. That means we should look for them here.
Garik wants to have a chat about something. However, we need to talk to the Trader first.
A stalker from the camp reported that the group was seen near the Southeastern hamlet and was heading towards the swamp. We should go check it out.
I found some rather sad information in Greek's PDA. I hope my fears won't be confirmed...

I found a dead mercenary in a house on the swamp. There was information in his PDA about his assignment, which he apparently failed to complete. This means there's still a chance that Bison is alive. We need to talk to the leader of the neutrals, maybe they've seen the mercenaries around these parts.
"Duty": Establish Contact
"Duty": Return to Toha

The leader of the neutrals is willing to participate in the elimination of the Syndicate members, but they're afraid that if only stalkers take part in the assault, the Syndicate will send people to retaliate. Therefore, we need to establish contact with Krasnopolye and try to persuade him to participate in the assault.
Krasnopolye and his group are already on their way, but they won't arrive until midnight tomorrow. Now we need to return to Toha and deliver the good news.
"Distress Signal": Check the Point
"Distress Signal": Kill the Controller
"Distress Signal": Talk to Garik
Garik asked for assistance with investigating a distress signal they caught not long ago.
Kill the mutant.
The controller is dead, as is the stalker who apparently sent the distress signal. It's worth talking to Garik before returning to base.
"Safe place": Reach a safe place
Head is pounding... Gear is gone. Need to get out of here and find a safer place.
"Coming to the rescue": Retrieve the case from the ravine
"Coming to the rescue": Deliver the case to Garik

A stalker offered to give me weapons in exchange for completing a task. To the northwest of the Stalkers' camp, there is a small ravine with anomalies, and in the ravine, I need to retrieve a case and deliver it to the stalker.
I have the case. Everything seems to have gone smoothly. All that's left is to deliver it to its owner.
"Lost": Find out what happened?
"Lost": Investigate the area
"Lost": Eliminate the Monolith squad
"Lost": Examine the bodies
"Lost": Deliver the found documents
On the radio, I heard that a group of stalkers went missing. It's worth offering to help with the search.
Toha briefly described the situation and pointed to the last point of contact with the squad. It's worth checking everything there. Maybe we'll find something.
While investigating, I ran into a Monolith squad. They're probably responsible for the disappearance of the stalkers, so I'll have to act.
The Monolith squad has been destroyed. Unfortunately, we couldn't save the guys. That's just how it is with the Monolith, killing the unfaithful... It's worth examining the bodies of the guys.
I was able to find some documents with the leader of the squad. It's worth taking them to Toha.
"New Beginning": Explore the Zone
"New Beginning": Return to the Neutral Leader
The leader of the neutral camp has marked the artifact search location, which is located in a cluster of gravitational anomalies. Be careful.
Artifact found. Return to the neutral leader.
"New Beginning": Explore the Zone
"New Beginning": Return to the Neutral Leader
The leader of the neutral camp has marked the artifact search location, which is located in a cluster of electrical anomalies. Be careful.
Artifact found. Return to the neutral leader.
"New Beginning": Explore the Zone
"New Beginning": Return to the Neutral Leader
The leader of the neutral camp has marked the artifact search location, which is located in a cluster of acidic anomalies. Be careful.
Artifact found. Return to the neutral leader.
"Scanning": Find the Lock Pick
"Scanning": Install the Scanner
"Scanning": Return for the Reward
Ivanich has tasked me with finding the missing lock pick and subsequently installing the scanner in the anomaly.
The lock pick is dead, but the scanner is now in my possession. All that's left is to install it and return to Ivanich.
The scanner has been successfully installed. Time to return for the reward.
"Trade Deal": Give the Case
Apparently, this case is what Foma needs. I need to give it to him.
"Hunting": Destroy Mutants
"Hunting": Claim Reward
Foma assigned me to a hunt. I need to clear out four mutant camps, and in return, he promised a good artifact as a reward.
The cleanup is done. Foma has dropped the coordinates of the cache where my reward is located.
"Military Secret": Find Military Maps
"Military Secret": Deliver Maps to Zhekan.
Zhekan told me that not too long ago, a military helicopter crashed in the vicinity, but where exactly is unknown. My task is to find the helicopter and retrieve the military maps from it.
The maps have been found. Now, I need to deliver them to Zhekan and collect my reward.
Destroy Bandits
Claim Reward
Claim the reward for destroying the bandits from the trader.
Destroy the bandits at Chertovoy Stoyanke. This will help stop the raiding of stalkers who return to base with their loot.
"Clean-up": Meet with Squad
"Clean-up": Destroy the Enemy
"Clean-up": Talk to Groza
"Clean-up": Collect Reward
"Clean-up": Collect Reward
The trader offered me a job to clean up a bandit camp. Now, I need to meet with the squad.
The leader of the squad, Groza, didn't waste any time and ordered us to attack.
The bandits have been eliminated, it is worth negotiating with Groza.
Collect the reward.
The bandits and the assault squad have perished, but no one has canceled the reward for the job well done.
